TitleEnglish: You Can't Be in a Rom-Com With Your Childhood Friends!
SummaryEnglish: The story centers on EiyÅ«, a high school boy whose two childhood friends, Shio and Akari, also go to the same school as him. He has now started looking at them with both romantic and lustful eyes, though he knows that they have no interest in him, which causes him no end of worrying. However, Shio and Akari have their own secrets.
Aliases: Osananajimi to wa LoveCom ni Naranai
